topic.title: 08Chan Updated Site Code ??  (not sure)
topic.body:
There was a github (?) link that had this thing where you download a data directory and then paste it into your data directory in Zeronet.  It may have been the updated site code and maybe some optional files like images people are uploading.
I can't find the link
I had to reinstall ZeroNet, so if anyone has that link, that would be great.

topic.title: Where is that "Link Page"
topic.body:
yeah, I wanted to see if there was some series available to watch, and I remember there being a link, but I can't find one to the videos pages.
I am sad because of this.

1566248008_1KSUcqHRcq26pF5vJ2297jrNcAzkN.body: will there be many more of these "Updates?"  It's beginning to feel like Windows 10 again.  This is why I switched to Linux.
goddammit the motherfucking spamposter threads all popped up again - I had them all muted and now they're back what the fuck goddamn motherfucking sonofabitch cocksucking nigger trannie kikes
